headline: Hilton Worldwide Holdings Inc. (HLT): A Bull Case Theory
summary: We came across a bullish thesis on Hilton Worldwide Holdings Inc. (HLT) on Waver’s Substack. In this article, we will summarize the bulls’ thesis on HLT. Hilton Worldwide Holdings Inc. (HLT)’s share was trading at $253.54 as of 11th June. HLT’s trailing and forward P/E were 39.82 and 31.45 respectively according to Yahoo Finance. Hilton’s evolution into […]
